nodes.text: The Bandercamp Auctions was an annual series of auctions held on Hinder Island on the planet Recopia. For five weeks, merchants from all over the galaxy flocked to the Hinder Market to buy and sell rare creatures to dealers from the Core Worlds and the Colonies.
To those who knew where to look, some less than scrupulous traders could be found dealing in sentient- or near-sentient creatures at the auctions.
